availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Garrell S. Hamilton (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Kelly Hamilton in Ohio County, Kentucky, on April 17, 1866. Farmer in Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Adams Fork, p. 567.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Bartletts, p. 323.
Find A Grave, "Garrell S. Hamilton (July 23, 1836-April 3, 1904)," Memorial #65522261 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/65522261 (accessed January 14, 2019).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 000494958, p. 47.
